text: sillo hananim-ui gil-eseo jasin-ui jaesan-eul huisahago geu hu eungeunhan jalang-ina hae kkichim-i geudeul-ui huisaleul dwittaleudolog haji anhneun jadeul, geudeul-egeneun geudeul junim-egeseoui bosang-i issnola. geuligo geudeul-ege dulyeoum-ilan eobs-eul geos-imyeo geudeul-eun seulpeohajido anh-eul geos-ila
